title: Holly & JP Heber Talk Healthy Soil on their South Dakota Farm

tasks.task: Discussing the transition from using strip till to cover crops in farming.
subtasks: Exchanging information about previous farming operations.
Explaining the decision to switch from strip till to cover crops.
Describing the process and benefits of using cover crops for soil moisture conservation.

tasks.task: Demonstrating soil aggregate stability with no-till and conventional till soil.
subtasks: Collecting soil samples for the demonstration.
Conducting the demonstration experiment with soil aggregates.
Observing and discussing the results of the soil aggregate stability test.
